main event: An observer reported a sighting of a bright, reddish light that moved briskly, eventually appearing as a stationary large object before disappearing.
interesting points: The observation lasted for over an hour, with the object being stationary at times., The object was described as round and approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter., The light was unusually bright with no blinking, making it distinct from conventional aircraft., Multiple witnesses were present during the sighting., The weather conditions included clear skies with calm winds.
sighted object: a bright, round object emitting white light
witness description: a railroad worker and a companion
